DOC.brief_summary: The study design assess effect vitamin D supplementation exercise training body composition , muscle function , glucose tolerance . The investigator hypothesis study vitamin D supplementation enhance exercise-induced increase strength lean mass , potentially enhance insulin sensitivity reduce inflammation .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Vitamin D Supplementation Muscle Mass Function
DOC.detailed_description: The study design assess effect vitamin D supplementation exercise training body composition , muscle function , glucose tolerance . It double-blind , randomize , placebo-controlled , clinical trial participant randomize either 4,000 IU/day vitamin D placebo group participant complete 12 wks ( 3 d/wk ) exercise training .
DOC.criteria: Physical activity score `` low '' `` low '' category Fitness estimations `` average '' low category body mass index score > 24.9 indicate overweight obesity . Use tan booth artificial UV light exposure High baseline vitamin D calcium intake Plans visit sunny/warm destination winter months/study period History presence metabolic disease , type 2 diabetes , eat disorder , gastrointestinal disorder , pregnancy lactation Use drug treat obesity ( last 12 week ) Use counter antiobesity agent ( last 12 week ) Recent initiation exercise program ( last four week ) .
